xtream.interfaces

Interface ISweepArea

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBooleanSweepArea, IFuzzySweepArea
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ABooleanSweepArea, AFuzzySweepArea, FuzzyVectorSweepArea, LSFuzzyVectorSweepArea

    public interface ISweepArea
    Author:
    ghalambor

      • Insert

        void Insert(ITuple tpl)
        Parameters:
        tpl - insert tuple to sweeparea

      • Replace

        void Replace(ITuple oldTpl,
             ITuple newTpl)
        replaces first occurrence of oldtuple with newtuple
        Parameters:
        oldTpl - old tuple to be replaced by new tuple
        newTpl - new tuple to be replace for old tuple

      • GetIterator

        java.util.Iterator<ITuple> GetIterator()
        Returns:
        iterator to scan all tuples

      • ExtractElements

        java.util.Iterator<ITuple> ExtractElements(ITuple tpl,
                                           int j)
        to extract tuples which should be removed Whenever the iterator returns an element, this element is removed from the SweepArea
        Parameters:
        tpl - tuple as a parameter for query
        j - j is 1 or 2 defining order of parameters
        Returns:
        iterator to results (tuples which should be removed)

      • PurgeElements

        int PurgeElements(ITuple tpl,
                  int j)
        to purge unused tuples
        Parameters:
        tpl - tuple as a parameter for query
        j - j is 1 or 2 defining order of parameters
        Returns:
        number of removed tuples

      • GetCount

        int GetCount()
        Returns:
        number of tuples in sweeparea
